articles.author: Mike Florio
articles.title: Jordon Hudson trolls Robert Kraft with "Orchids of Asia" T-shirt - NBC Sports
articles.description: Nobody does petty better than Bill Belichick.
articles.content:
Nobody does petty better than Bill Belichick. Or his girlfriend, Jordon Hudson.
Last year, Hudson trolled the Falcons with a Super Bowl LI championship T-shirt. Thats the game in which the Falcons b… [+828 chars]
